item.title: 下一场人工智能颠覆并非来自你想象的地方
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社遍布全球的记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，弗拉德-萨沃夫（Vlad Savov）将探讨该行业通过小型专业公司实现突破的特殊习惯。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Vlad Savov looks at the industry’s peculiar habit of achieving breakthroughs via smaller, specialized companies.】

item.description: 我是马尔科姆-斯科特，驻悉尼的国际经济企业编辑。今天我们关注中国2025年的经济目标。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您尚未注册接收本新闻通讯，请点击此处。【原文：I’m Malcolm Scott, international economics enterprise editor in Sydney. item.title: 中国船舶收费为美国贸易战开辟新战场
item.description: 造船业和海运贸易正在成为中美贸易战的新战场，与唐纳德-特朗普总统呼吁全面征收关税不同，他对航运业的打压似乎得到了华盛顿各政治派别的支持。【原文：Shipbuilding and maritime trade are emerging as new fronts in the US-China trade war, and unlike President Donald Trump’s call for blanket tariffs, his shipping crackdown seems to have support across the political spectrum in Washington.】

item.title: 百度以 21 亿美元收购 YY 实时视频流业务
item.description: 百度公司已从 Joyy 公司收购了 YY Live 流媒体平台，结束了自 2020 年以来一直酝酿的交易。【原文：Baidu Inc. has acquired the YY Live streaming platform from Joyy Inc., concluding a drawn-out deal that had been in the works since 2020.】

item.title: 伊朗石油运输因抢购未经许可的油轮而受阻
item.description: 据分析公司 Kpler 称，随着来自俄罗斯和委内瑞拉的未获批准的油轮的竞争加剧，伊朗石油销售商在将货物运出伊朗时可能面临巨大障碍。【原文：Iranian oil sellers risk facing significant hurdles moving their cargoes out of the country as competition for unsanctioned tankers from Russia and Venezuela intensifies, according to analytics firm Kpler.】

item.title: 美银美林策略师哈特内特警告：S&P 500 指数反弹招致投资者质疑
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）策略师迈克尔-哈特内特（Michael Hartnett）认为，在欧洲和中国股市表现出色之际，投资者对 S&P 500 指数的涨幅空间越来越 "怀疑"。【原文：There’s growing “suspicion” among investors about the scope for more S&P 500 gains at a time when European and Chinese stocks are outperforming, according to Bank of America Corp. strategist Michael Hartnett.】

item.title: 有迹象表明特朗普的政策攻势开始伤害市场
item.description: 悄悄地说，但全球金融市场开始出现迹象表明，唐纳德-特朗普多管齐下的政策议程正变得有点难以承受。【原文：Whisper it, but signs are starting to emerge across global financial markets that the weight of Donald Trump’s multi-pronged policy agenda is becoming a bit too much to bear.】

item.title: 特斯拉将收购陷入困境的德国供应商 Manz 的部分资产
item.description: 特斯拉公司同意收购陷入困境的德国自动化系统供应商 Manz AG 的部分资产。【原文：Tesla Inc. agreed to buy certain assets of embattled German automation systems supplier Manz AG, which has entered insolvency proceedings after facing a liquidity squeeze.】

item.title: 富国银行加快外汇期权交易增长步伐
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.）正在为其交易业务增加一条新战线，高管们认为这是对该公司能否与华尔街巨头一较高下的关键考验。【原文：Wells Fargo & Co. is adding a new front to a trading business that executives see as a key test for the firm’s ability to go toe-to-toe with Wall Street giants.】

item.title: 通胀和关税忧虑升温，黄金股熠熠生辉
item.description: 在 2025 年的最初几个月里，黄金矿商的股价一路飙升，因为通胀和地缘政治的风险促使分析师们提高了对贵金属这一典型避险资产的展望。【原文：Shares of gold miners are soaring in the early months of 2025, as risks around inflation and geopolitics push analysts to ramp up their outlook for the precious metal, a classic haven asset.】

item.title: 英国石油公司的重大战略调整：埃利奥特圈子的五大看点
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）周三的 "基本面重启 "是几年来最受瞩目的石油巨头战略转变。【原文：BP Plc’s “fundamental reset” on Wednesday is the most highly anticipated strategy shift for an oil major in several years.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯发行中东首笔欧元绿色债券
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯启动了以欧元计价的绿色债券的销售，这是该地区主权国家的首笔此类交易，目的是为王国雄心勃勃的经济转型计划提供资金。【原文：Saudi Arabia kicked off the sale of a euro-denominated green bond, the first such deal from a sovereign in the region, as it looks to fund the kingdom’s ambitious economic-transformation plan.】

item.title: 欧元区工资增长从创纪录降温，支持欧洲央行缩减开支
item.description: 衡量欧元区薪资增长的一项关键指标在 2024 年底有所放缓，支持了欧洲中央银行在通胀放缓之际继续降息的计划。【原文：A key measure of euro-area pay growth eased at the end of 2024, supporting European Central Bank plans to keep cutting interest rates as inflation slows.】

item.title: 德国央行行长希望尽快组建德国新政府
item.description: 德国联邦银行行长约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，德国各政党应在周日大选后迅速组建新政府，以防止经济连续第三年无法扩张。【原文：German parties should quickly form a new government after Sunday’s election, to help prevent the economy failing to expand for a third straight year, according to Bundesbank President Joachim Nagel.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长纳格尔呼吁同事停止降息猜测
item.description: 欧洲央行管理委员会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）认为，在通胀持续高企和不确定性增加的情况下，欧洲央行官员 "最好 "停止公开讨论他们对利率的偏好。【原文：European Central Bank officials would be “well advised” to stop openly discussing their preferences for interest rates amid sticky inflation and elevated uncertainty, according to Governing Council member Joachim Nagel.】

item.title: 尼日利亚消费者信贷公司（Nigeria's Consumer Credit Corp.正在缓慢获得动力
item.description: 尼日利亚为促进其狭小的消费信贷市场所做的努力正逐渐取得成效。【原文：Nigeria’s bid to boost its tiny consumer-credit market is gradually building up steam.】

item.title: 中国竞争升级，DeepSeek 重新开放人工智能模型访问权限
item.description: DeepSeek 在暂停近三周后重新开放了对其核心编程界面的访问，恢复了一项对更广泛地采用人工智能模型至关重要的服务。【原文：DeepSeek has reopened access to its core programming interface after nearly a three-week suspension, resuming a service key to wider adoption of an AI model that’s proven remarkably popular since its emergence last month.】

item.title: 巴西近海石油公司受到监管机构打击钻井的影响
item.description: 巴西监管机构正在打击巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）和 Equinor ASA 等石油巨头的一些近海钻探活动，在巴西努力提高原油产量的关键时刻，使勘探和生产项目变得更加复杂。【原文：Brazilian regulators are cracking down on some offshore drilling by oil giants like Petrobras and Equinor ASA, complicating exploration and production projects at a key moment in the nation’s effort to boost crude output.】

item.title: 罗根赞成在美联储恢复购买时购买短期资产
item.description: 达拉斯联邦储备银行行长洛里-洛根（Lorie Logan）表示，从中期来看，美国央行购买更多短期证券而不是长期证券是合适的，这样其投资组合就能更快地反映国债发行的构成。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas President Lorie Logan said it would be appropriate, in the medium term, for the US central bank to purchase more shorter-term securities than longer-term ones so that its portfolio can more quickly mirror the composition of Treasury issuance.】

item.title: 挪威国家银行支持欧洲推迟实施巴塞尔交易账簿规则
item.description: 荷兰国家银行行长克拉斯-克诺（Klaas Knot）表示，他对欧洲推迟采用最新的银行资本规则持开放态度，以便与美国的预期时间框架保持一致。【原文：Dutch National Bank Governor Klaas Knot said he’s open to delaying Europe’s adoption of the latest suite of bank capital rules to align with the anticipated US timeframe.】

item.title: 花旗老将莱卡斯将在阿布扎比第一银行担任高级职务
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，花旗集团前资深员工 Linos Lekkas 即将加入阿布扎比最大的贷款公司。【原文：Linos Lekkas, a former Citigroup Inc. veteran, is set to join Abu Dhabi’s largest lender, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 吉姆-比安科解释 "马阿拉歌协议
item.description:
特朗普政府是否会试图重新安排国际金融体系的秩序？【原文：

Will the Trump administration attempt to reorder the international financial system?

】

item.title: 交易员押注美联储降息，国债反弹
item.description: 由于交易员提高了对美联储降息的押注，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税计划对风险偏好构成压力，国债反弹。【原文：Treasuries rallied as traders boosted bets on Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts, with US President Donald Trump’s tariff plans weighing on risk appetite.】

item.title: 奇货可居：吉姆-比安科解释 "马阿拉歌协议"（播客）
item.description: 所谓的 "马阿拉歌协议"（Mar-a-Lago Accord）突然成为华尔街的热门话题，一些投资者和分析师开始更加认真地对待这一想法，与客户举行会议，并发表有关这一传闻计划的研究报告。该计划是对1985年《广场协议》（Plaza Accord）的翻版，该协议因设计该协议的酒店而得名，其理念是特朗普政府可以通过重新安排金融体系来实现其经济目标，其中包括有意识地让美元贬值。这【原文：The so-called “Mar-a-Lago Accord” has suddenly become a hot topic on Wall Street, with some investors and analysts starting to take the idea more seriously, holding meetings with clients and publishing research notes about the rumored plan. A riff on the 1985 Plaza Accord — named for the hotel where it was devised — the idea is that the Trump administration could achieve its economic aims through a reordering of the financial system that would include a conscious effort to devalue the dollar. Th】

item.title: 德国工业界认为国家竞争力受到威胁
item.description: 德国工业游说团体正敦促下届政府减少官僚作风，加快审批程序，降低电费，以阻止德国竞争力的下降。【原文：Germany’s industry lobby is urging the next government to slash bureaucracy, accelerate approval processes, and lower electricity costs to stop the country’s declining competitiveness.】

item.title: 凯雷创始人支持的 Alterra 收购非洲旅游公司股份
item.description: Alterra Capital Partners 收购了东非最大的目的地旅游公司之一 ARP Africa Travel Ltd. 的多数股权，押注非洲大陆旅游业的发展。【原文：Alterra Capital Partners bought a majority stake in ARP Africa Travel Ltd., one of East Africa’s largest companies for destination trips, as it bets on tourism growing on the continent.】

item.title: 债券市场正视德国支出快速增长的前景
item.description: 在政策制定者讨论借贷更多资金用于国防开支之际，一项广受关注的衡量德国债务吸引力的指标跌至有史以来最负面的水平。【原文：A widely-watched gauge of the attractiveness of German debt fell to the most negative on record as policymakers discuss borrowing more to fund defense spending.】

item.title: 博鳌亚洲论坛认为交易客户在特朗普的不确定性中持观望态度
item.description: 自今年年初以来，由于客户对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普新政府的施政方针越来越不确定，美国银行（Bank of America Corp.【原文：Bank of America Corp. has seen investor activity slow since the start of the year as clients have grown increasingly uncertain about the course US President Donald Trump’s new administration will take.】

item.title: 新日铁在接到投资电话后坚持收购美国钢铁公司
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示日本公司正在考虑投资美国钢铁公司之后，新日本制铁公司重申了以 141 亿美元收购美国钢铁公司的目标。【原文：Nippon Steel Corp. reiterated its objective for the $14.1 billion takeover of United States Steel Corp. after President Donald Trump said the Japanese company was considering an investment instead.】

item.title: 丰田寻求通过独立董事 "重振 "董事会
item.description: 丰田汽车公司（Toyota Motor Corp. ）将把独立董事的人数增加到其 10 人董事会的一半，并采用新的监督委员会结构，旨在加强全球第一大汽车制造商的管理。【原文：Toyota Motor Corp. will increase the number of independent directors to half of its 10-member board and adopt a new supervisory committee structure aimed at bolstering governance at the world’s No. 1 carmaker.】
